section1.title: We are Gimdecar
section1.description: We are the school where love, academia and spirituality come together.
section1.description2: Our educational community is willing and passionate to be positive tools for you and your family.

section2.title: Gimdecar is closer to you
section2.description: The perfect place for the education of your children. We are in the neighborhood Pie de la Popa, in Cartagena de Indias.

section3.title: Life is to learn
section3.subtitle: We teach to life:
section3.description: We accompany the student in his learning process through an active, conceptual pedagogical model with a social approach that considers the student craftsman of his own knowledge.

section4.title: Testimonials
section4.description2: Nuestra comunidad educativa está dispuesta y apasionada por ser herramientas positivas para ti y tu familia.

section5.title: ¿Your child has communication skills?
section5.description: In Gimdecar we have a music room for your children to develop their talent
